otp.group6.view

Class SaveMixerSettingsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.view.SaveMixerSettingsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SaveMixerSettingsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Class handles SaveMixerSettings.fxml functions. Is used to store mixer settings to the database.
    Author:
    Joonas Soininen

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Method initializes this class when loaded, calls setLocalization(ResourceBundle) to set certain variables passing the ResourceBundle to it.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        arg1, - is the resource bundle provided from the MainControler.java containing the language settings

      • setLocalization

        private void setLocalization(java.util.ResourceBundle bundle)
        Method sets all visible texts and button labels to chosen language.
        Parameters:
        bundle - transfers the localization data to the method so the right language is set

      • setMainController

        public void setMainController(MainController mainController)
        Method sets variable to the parameter provided from MainController.java
        Parameters:
        mainController, - is the instance of MainController.java that is in the current thread running. Connects to the database.

      • getSettings

        public void getSettings(double sliderPitch,
                        double sliderEchoLength,
                        double sliderDecay,
                        double sliderGain,
                        double sliderFlangerLength,
                        double sliderWetness,
                        double sliderLfoFrequency,
                        float sliderLowPass)
        Method is used to get the mixer values from the MainController.java and set them to the local variables. Makes sure the tool tip is show on immediately when values are fetched.
        Parameters:
        sliderPitch, - double value
        sliderEchoLength, - double value
        sliderDecay, - double value
        sliderGain, - double value
        sliderFlangerLength, - double value
        sliderWetness, - double value
        sliderLfoFrequency, - double value
        sliderLowPass, - float value

      • saveMix

        public void saveMix()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method is used to store mixer values to the database. Alerts are used for feedback with the process.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if there are any errors with the database connection.

      • checkEmpty

        public boolean checkEmpty(java.lang.String input)
        Checks if string contains only whitespaces
        Parameters:
        input - -- String to be checked
        Returns:
        returns true if string contains only whitespaces, otherwise returns false

        public void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

        Parameters:
        event, - handles the on push events of binded buttons
